pkgmetadata.longdescription: Open Babel is a chemical toolbox designed to speak the many languages of chemical data. It's an open, collaborative project allowing anyone to search, convert, analyze, or store data from molecular modeling, chemistry, solid-state materials, biochemistry, or related areas.

use.flag: Build support for IUPAC International Chemical Identifier format
Build support for JSON formats (ChemDoodle, PubChem, etc...)
